::Hot Rod::

He still wasn't sure how to train with this new hologram that had
replaced the tennis game. He took a second, and put on some head phones.
He hit the play button on his CD player. The song 'The Touch' by Stan
Bush came over the head phones.

OOC: Just felt like posting something.
